short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Coupon Admin is a tool to automatically clip digital coupons to help you save time and spend less!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Is your thumb tired of scrolling and clipping digital coupons on your phone? 👎
Do you dread wasting time manually clipping digital coupons? 😭
🛑 Stop wasting your time. 
👉 Try ✂️ Coupon Admin! 🥳

There is no paywall for Coupon Admin. Free forever. ✊

IS IT MAGIC 🧙‍♂️
Coupon Admin searches for digital coupons and the key text within each coupon button. If the key phrases match, then Coupon Admin will auto clip all available digital coupons super fast. Once Coupon Admin is finished it will provide a count of the digital coupons it was able to clip. Some grocery coupon sites check for automation tools so Coupon Admin has an internal list of the sites and will warn you to use "Delay Control". Delay Control is found by clicking the settings icon ⚙️. There you can adjust the delay between coupon clips.

MOBILE SUPPORT (Yes!) ☎️
To use Coupon Admin in your mobile browser by adding a Bookmarklet. Bookmarklets are usually small snippets of JavaScript executed when user clicks on them. Works in mobile Chrome & Safari browser apps. 

Visit https://couponadmin.com/bookmarklet-sign-up/ to receive the bookmarklet. 

How to use the bookmarklet: When you are on your store’s digital savings site, open your mobile bookmarks and select the bookmark you created with the bookmarklet. By selecting the bookmarklet, it will run the JavaScript and Coupon Admin will activate. 

FEATURE PIPELINE ⚗️
- Clip all available coupons automatically loading more or clicking next page.
- Ability for Coupon Admin to look for certain coupons by keywords and clip those before any other coupons.
- Better human like movement when Coupon Admin is clipping to prevent webpages from spotting a bot.
- Do I dare to say, AI? 💀

CONTACT 📇
Please reach out if you find your store is not supported, richard@couponadmin.com.

Visit CouponAdmin.com to learn more.
